original_text: “Then Aaron is to go into the tent of meeting and take off the linen garments he put on before he entered the Most Holy Place, and he is to leave them there.
korean_text: 아론은 회막에 들어가서 지성소에 들어갈 때에 입었던 세마포 옷을 벗어 거기 두고

sentences.original_text: Then Aaron is to go into the tent of meeting
and take off the linen garments
he put on before he entered the Most Holy Place
and he is to leave them there
